changeSet.sql: UPDATE attachment a SET url = 'https://www.shikkanime.fr/assets/img/episode_no_image_preview.jpg' WHERE a.uuid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT at_em.uuid FROM episode_variant ev JOIN episode_mapping em ON em.uuid = ev.mapping_uuid JOIN attachment at_em ON at_em.entity_uuid = em.uuid AND at_em.active = true JOIN attachment at_a ON at_a.entity_uuid = em.anime_uuid AND at_a.active = true WHERE ev.platform = 'ANIM' AND regexp_replace(at_em.url, '\.[^.]*$', '') = regexp_replace(at_a.url, '\.[^.]*$', '') );
